MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the EH17 postcode area of Edinburgh, affecting properties in Lasswade Bank and surrounding areas. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11:08PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of the extent of the repairs required and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8am. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:00 AM on Monday, 11 January 2021
